ingredients: 1 whole large sea bream (or any white, firm, fleshy fish), about 1 1/2 pounds
1 thumb-sized piece ginger, peeled and cut into thin strips + 5 round slices, about 1 inch in diameter and 1/8-inch thick
2-3 green onions, cut into thin strips
2 small hot red pepper, deseeded and cut into thin strips
2 tablespoons Chinese rice wine or any dry white wine
Freshly grated black pepper to taste
